ChatMute(IGuildUser, string)

Mutes a user in chat and not voice.

Declaration
[Cmd("ChatMute")]
[Aliases("ChatMute")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.ManageRoles)]
[Priority(0)]
public Task ChatMute(IGuildUser user, string reason = "")

The user to mute
string reason
